Posts.Content: kenziesmom22407 wrote: I made a post last night,and even though i had a couple of people give me some kind words, I did't really get the answers or opinions i would like. I am 22 years old and about 6 months ago my left nipple became inverted and about 2 weeks ago the same breast became sore on the side next to my arm pit and on the bottom under the areola. It is really sore to touch and every now and them my 2 year old daughter will push on it by accident and a sharp pain will shoot through. I am scheduled an appt. in two weeks but i have worried about it and I could use several opinions. If anyone knows what might be wrong please help me.
